title: JapaneZ
description:
Facilitates the learning of the three Japanese alphabets. This app allows users to practice their writing, listening, and test their knowledge.
Technologies used: React, Redux, MUI, AWS S3

title: JournalMe
description:
Organizational web app where a user can log in to view notes, reminders, and set personal goals. It was inspired by bullet journaling tiktoks! 
Technologies used: React, Redux, MUI, MongoDB

title: ProjectOne
description:
A CyberSecurity blog created with one other developer. Here we updated with cybersecurity news and capture the flag problems we enjoyed. 
Technologies used: React, ChakraUI, MongoDB

title: Bookie Django
description:
A work in progress - this project will simulate a hotel booking site. 
 Technologies used: Django, PostgreSQL, MUI, React

title: C# Employee project
description: An unamed planned project where employers can keep track of their employees work history and information.
